summary: This is an email chain from November 9, 2020, among legal professionals discussing scheduling a call to provide an update on a new development regarding the Epstein Estate. It shows ongoing legal and administrative work related to Epstein's estate after his death.

persons.name: Marc A. Weinstein
persons.role: Partner, Chair of White Collar Defense at Hughes Hubbard & Reed
persons.context: He initiates the email chain to schedule a call to provide an update on a new development regarding the Epstein Estate.

persons.name: Andrew Tomback
persons.context: He is copied on Marc Weinstein's initial email regarding the Epstein Estate update.

connections.description: Weinstein copies Tomback on an email regarding an update on the Epstein Estate, indicating a professional or legal collaboration.

events.title: Epstein Estate update discussion
events.description: Legal professionals schedule a call to discuss a new development regarding the Epstein Estate.

keyFacts: The email is dated November 9, 2020, showing ongoing legal activity related to Jeffrey Epstein's estate over a year after his death.
Marc A. Weinstein, a partner at Hughes Hubbard & Reed, is involved in providing an update on a 'new development' regarding the Epstein Estate.
The correspondence indicates coordination among legal professionals to manage estate matters, suggesting continued administrative or legal proceedings.
